root.cn: 一款平板上的趣味动物拼图早教认知游戏！ 在动物乐园里有各种好玩又有趣的动物，可以让宝宝进行快速学习认知！ 包含100多种动物,涵盖鸟类动物，哺乳动物，海洋动物，昆虫等； 配合标准中英文发音，认识动物，激发孩子学习兴趣，启发孩子的想象力、记忆力、创造力，开发智力； 宝贝们，快来一起玩动物趣味拼图吧!
root.en: TAn interesting animal puzzle game of early education in the Pad! There are all kinds of interesting and interesting animals in the zoo, so that babies can learn and learn quickly. It contains more than 100 species of animals, including birds, mammals, marine animals, insects, etc. Coordinate with standard pronunciation in Chinese and English, recognize animals, stimulate children's interest in learning, inspire children's imagination, memory, creativity, and develop intelligence. Baby, come and play with the animal fun puzzle together!
